title: Retirement Life - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Amnesia   Ancient Times   Anti-social Protagonist   Apocalypse   Coma   Cooking   Death   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Family   Family Business   Farming   First Love   Jealousy   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magical Space   Marriage   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Multiple Transported Individuals   Past Trauma   Poor to Rich   Possessive Characters   Quiet Characters   Reincarnation   Revenge   Royalty   Servants   Sickly Characters   Stoic Characters   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Weak Protagonist   Zombies
author: Lóu Gū   楼孤
description:
Four years after the end of the world, Lin Mo finally gave up running and died in a zombie tide. However, when he woke up, he found himself transmigrated. Lin Mo was very satisfied with his leisurely life after crossing. What he is most satisfied with is that he has someone who loves him. Hungry, cold, or sick, someone cares about him and protects him. For Lin Mo, at the end of his life, Cheng Yan is his little angel.

Cheng Yan, with a serious face, listening to his wife: Mn, I am.

A group of generals and soldiers: …

All servants of the palace: …>
